metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6541 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In ZZIPlib 0.13.67, there is a bus error caused by loading of a misaligned address (when handling disk64_trailer local entries) in __zzip_fetch_disk_trailer (zzip/zip.c). Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted zip file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zziplib package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
